ARABIC: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Wait then! I am waiting with you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Tell them: "Keep on expecting, I am expecting with you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them: “Wait; I too am waiting with you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Wait, I too am waiting with you".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “Go on waiting – I too am waiting along with you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Wait! I am with you among those who wait!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Wait, for surely I too with you am of those who wait.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'Await! I shall be awaiting with you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto them): Except (your fill)! Lo! I am with you among the expectant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: say [to them], "Wait then: I too am waiting along with you!" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: waits verily I am, with you, among the waiters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Wait! I too am waiting along with you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say thou: "Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW to them): "Wait! I am with you, among the waiters!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Wait if you will; I shall be waiting with you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Go on waiting; I will be waiting with you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:31] Say: ‘Await!, my death. For I too will be with you awaiting’, your death. They were then chastised with [death by] the sword on the day of Badr.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) Muhammad, to Abu Jahl, al-Walid Ibn al-Mughirah and their hosts: (Expect (your fill)) wait for my death! (Lo! I am with you among the expectant) I will also wait for your chastisement; and they were indeed punished on the Day of Badr.
